content: The Flint Vanguard is a lava-rock copy of the Stone Vanguard you face in Yellow Wind Ridge. He has all the same attacks, but the battle is further complicated by his fire abilities and the horde of enemies that join the fight as well.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flint_Vanguard_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Flint Vanguard Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Flint Vanguard Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The Flint Vanguard is a lava-rock copy of the Stone Vanguard you face in Yellow Wind Ridge. He has all the same attacks, but the battle is further complicated by his fire abilities and the horde of enemies that join the fight as well.
